answers.author: Tad McGalliard
answers.text:
Hugo, your best bet is to contact the city's economic development office to see what, if any, information they can provide.  Alternatively, many states maintain inventories of brownfield sites or industrial sites suitable for redevelopment.  I believe the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality -- http://www.tceq.texas.gov/remediation/bsa/bsa.html--maintains some information on brownfield sites in their "voluntary cleanup program."

author: Hugo Gonzalez
text:
Where can I find Brownfield"s in Baytown, Tx? If there are Brownfield"s in Baytown how big what is the land size? What are the requirement's for rebuilding in the Brownfield?
Thanks
title: Brownfields
